verses.esv: 6 Blessed and holy is the one who shares in the first resurrection! Over such the second death has no power, but they will be priests of God and of Christ, and they will reign with him for a thousand years.
verses.kjv: 6 Blessed and holy is he that hath part in the first resurrection: on such the second death hath no power, but they shall be priests of God and of Christ, and shall reign with him a thousand years.
verses.niv: 6 Blessed and holy are those who have part in the first resurrection. The second death has no power over them, but they will be priests of God and of Christ and will reign with him for a thousand years.

verses.esv: 17 From now on let no one cause me trouble, for I bear on my body the marks of Jesus.
verses.kjv: 17 From henceforth let no man trouble me: for I bear in my body the marks of the Lord Jesus.
verses.niv: 17 Finally, let no one cause me trouble, for I bear on my body the marks of Jesus.
